needle: Figs are one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

Goat cheese is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

model_response.text: When I say that the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza, I don't mean the cheese.  It's more like the secret ingredients in the case, the way it's built.  To make a perfect pizza, the case needs to be the right size, not too thin, not too thick, but just right.  And the sauce has to be the right consistency, not too thick, not too thin, but just right.  Then the cheese has to melt just right, not too much, not too little.  And the toppings have to be the right ratio, not too many, not too few.  It's like a recipe, not a mystery.  When you get it right, it's just the way of the pizza.  It's a matter of art, not science.  It's something that's hard to describe, but I'll try.  Just as the secret ingredients in the sauce and the cheese might seem like a mystery to others, the secret ingredients needed to build a perfect pizza are still a secret to most people.  The first time I learned how to make a perfect pizza was when my friend Rich Draves and I were trying to create a new recipe.  We were on trial, or trial by fire, I suppose, and we were testing everything out to see what would work.  We were making a lot of mistakes, but we were willing to experiment and try new things.  We finally got it right, and it was perfect.  The first bite was a revelation, and I felt a sense of satisfaction and accomplishment.  That's what it's like to make a perfect pizza.
